name: The Witch King

items.name: Vasamacil
items.description: (Q. 'Blade-eater', S. 'Vasamegil') Flaming broadsword forged in Thangorodrim out of black ithilnaur and inlaid with veins of fused rubbies.

items.name: Nallagurth
items.description: ('Death's Proclaimer). Mace forged in Utumno out of black eog and subtly inlaid with veins of fused diamonds.

items.name: Romoquenáro
items.description: Númenórean steel composite bow. Whenever it is fired in darkness its arrow immolates upen leaving the bow. While on fire, the arrow yields a +30 Fireball attack whenever it strikes a target.

items.name: Morgul-knife
items.description: Dagger with striles as a short sword. Its long, thin enchanged blade gleams with a cold glint. Its dibolves when exposed to sunligth and breaks off whenever the knife yields a critial strike. Once the blade is embedded in a victim, the victim must roll a RR versus the wielder's lvl. Failure results in the blade findings its way to the victim's hearth within a number of days equals to 50 minus the RR failure number. [TODO]

items.name: Crown of Angmar
items.description: A simple, enchanted iron crown, unadorned by any jewels or inlays. It is the symbol od the King of the North. A +6 Essence and Channeling spell adder, its add +15 to wearer's DB.

items.name: Thôlogaer Ciryatano
items.description: ('Sea-helm of Ciryatan') A x6 Essence and Channeling PP multiplier, the magic Sea-Helm was one woen by Tad-Ciryatan of Númenor. Uts overlaping Sea-drake skin plates climax in a spiny crown-shaped crest, a variation of the karma design used by the Uinendil (S. 'Followers of Uinen') Captains of Númenor. Its add +5 to wearer RRs vs spells attacks.

items.name: Morgul Plate
items.description: Black Sea-Drake skin plate armor with encumbers wearer like normal clothes (i.e. no armor/AT1).

notes: Presence - Anyone coming withing sigth of a Nazgûl makes a RR versus a 6th level Fear spell. <special>

name: Adûnaphel
description: Black Númenórean Bard. Seventh of the Nine.

name: Dwar
description: Wôlim Mage. Third of the Nine.

name: Hoarmûrath
description: Urd Animist. Sixth of the Nine.

name: Indûr
description: Kiarn Mage. Fourth of the Nine.

name: Ren
description: Chey Mage/Illusionist. Eigth of the Nine.
